page.title: 01The Surroundings
page.content: Our 12 Km squares are situated in the Vale of York,between the{Pennines}to the west,and the{Cleveland}and {Hambleton Hills}to the east.The{River {Swale}flows through this area from west to east.This flat area of North Yorkshire on either side of the river is fertile farmland. The main centre of population is in {Catterick Village,}and the remainder of this area is sparsely populated.The nearest towns are{Richmond,Darlington and{Northallerton. The main A1 road crosses the east of the area and carries a great amount of traffic.Close to the A1,and to the south east of Catterick Village is {R.A.F.Catterick.} The area is beautiful unspoilt countryside.
